topic.title: 가게에 상품 환불하기
topic.description: 가게에서 구매한 상품이 마음에 들지 않거나 문제가 있을 때 환불을 요청하는 상황의 대화입니다.

korean_scripts.korean_text: 집에 와서 입어보니 사이즈가 안 맞더라고요.
결제하신 카드로 금액이 다시 들어갈 거예요.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Hello, I'd like to return this shirt.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Hello, | I'd like to return this shirt.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Of course. Do you have the receipt?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Of course. || Do you have the receipt?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Yes, here it is. I bought it yesterday.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Yes, | here it is. || I bought it yesterday.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Okay. Is there a specific reason for the return?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Okay. || Is there a specific reason | for the return?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: When I got home and tried it on, it didn't fit right.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: When I got home and tried it on, | it didn't fit right.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: I see. I can process the refund for you.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: I see. || I can process the refund | for you.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: The amount will be credited back to the card you paid with.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: The amount will be credited back | to the card you paid with.

keyword_speeches.target_sentence: I'd like to return this shirt. I have the receipt. I bought it yesterday.
The reason for the return is that when I got home and tried it on, it didn't fit right.
I'd like a refund. I have the receipt.
It didn't fit right, so please process the refund.
I'd like to return this because of the size.
I'd like to return this. I have the receipt. It didn't fit right.

learning_points.foreign_phrase: Is there a specific reason for the return
I can process the refund for you
